# MobileDriversLicenseDisplayRequest.Options

**Structure**

An object that customizes how to perform a display request.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Options
```

## Overview

Use this object to configure the validation mode of the request.

## Structures

- **MobileDriversLicenseDisplayRequest.Options.ValidationMode**: A type that represents the validation mode of the mobile document request.

## Initializers

- **init(validationMode:)**: Creates a mobile document reader display request options type.

## Instance Properties

- **validationMode**: The validation mode of the mobile document request.

## Configuring a display request

- **options**: An object that customizes how to perform a display request.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
